item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa rdzogs so// bam po bzhi pa// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+thsa ba ban+de dza ya ra k+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsa r+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sab ta pa tra de kA nA ma he ra ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya sing+ng+h dang/ shu d+d+ha sing+ng+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur

item.tib: 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya bya'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dz+nyA na skra nA ma dA ra Ni sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya bya'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa
item.skttrans: ma hA shrI nA ma d+va da sha ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+harmA sA ga ra nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so

item.tib: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bar+Na sha ba rI nA ma d+ha ra ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga
item.skttrans: bo d+hi maN+Da a lang+ka ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni u pa tsA ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so
'jam dpal gyi dam bcas pa'i gzunngs rdzogs s+h+yo
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so

item.tib: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+yA many+dzu shrI ba D+hA ra ka s+ya pradz+nyA bud+d+hiH ba d+ha Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so

item.skttrans: sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ka Da ki ni badzra la sam+b+hu ra nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra

item.tib: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po rdo rje me lde'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: nI lam+b+ha ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ya kA ma hA rau dra badzra ag+ni dzi h+va tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gtum po drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud gyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rad+na kyi ti'u zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes kyis bsgyur/ slad kyis dge tshul khyung grags kyis bka' drin mnos nas/ / rgya dpe bod la sbyan drangs nas gtan la phab pa'o

item.coloph: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho

'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ mkhan chen thar pa lo ts+tsha ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas sog yar lnga byung ba sdar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyong stod smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jig pa'i slobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sbrod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan ba'o/ rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi/ chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang / dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ ji ltar num bzhin bsgyur ba lags/ 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang / rgyad pa'i dpe dbang ma rnyed cing / don zab sgra ni rtogs bka' la/ saM skr-i ta la ma byang bas/ sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor ba'i/ nongs nge mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing / phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ ma dag shes na bcos par zhu/ rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las/ dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa/ de yis mtha' yas 'go ba kun/ rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa

item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chos kyi sde dang/ khams pa ba ri lo ts+tsha bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: 'phags ma 'od gzer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma ri ts+yai nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags ma 'od gzer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //khams pa lots-tsha ba ris bygrur ba'o
sgyu ma 'od zer can 'byung ba ces bya ba'i rgyud las phyung ba/ rtog pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du ji snyed pa rdzogs so
'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las mchog tu shin tu yang/ snying por gyur pa'i 'od zer can gyi rtog pa brgya phrag bdun pa phyung ba rdzogs so

item.tib: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sar+b+ba maN+Dala sa mA n+ya bi da na gu h+ya tan+t+ra
item.coloph: las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i rgyud kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //'di'i ma dpe la snga zhus nam mkha' dpal mgon gyis byas/ shu baM ma stu sar+b+ba dza ga taM

item.tib: gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa
item.skttrans: ma Ni b+ha dra yak+Sha se nA kalpa
item.coloph: nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ ji snyed tshad kyi sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rtog pa// // rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rdo rje gdengs po zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta a Da ya shi ma ti zhes bya ba dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar pa ban de chos kyi dbang phyug grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
yum bzhi'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho
'phasg pa nor rgyun gyi rgyud ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so
ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi rtog pa rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA kalpa rA dza
item.coloph: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ces bya ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so// //oM he d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+de ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa dat/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA dI ma hA shra ma Na e s+w+A hA

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa ces bya ba
item.skttrans: a na bi la ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: dpal bde ba dam rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa ces bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa// //rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsh+tsha wa dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal bde mchog 'byung ba ces bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI sam+Wa ra sa mA wa tan+t+ra rA dza sya nA ma

item.tib: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.skttrans: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po

item.tib: dpal kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI he badzra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: brtag pa gsum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kye yi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ta'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing zhus ste slad kyis dge bsnyen chos kyi blo gros kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'o// //de ltar brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyud rje mar pas 'gyur bcos mdzod pa rngog gi 'grel pa dang bstun te dag par cig car rdo rje 'dzin pa bsod nams tshul khrims kyi sbyin bdag byas te spar du bkod pa'i yi ge pa bod snyi ba bsam grub brgyal po/ /spar la mkhas pa gnyal smad brag god pa dpal 'byor grogs mched gsuM gyis bsgrubs pa shin tu dag par zhus pa'o//

item.tib: bya khyung gi las rgyud chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma ha kar ma ka ru na tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: las rnams bzhi'i tshogs zhes bya ba 'byung po 'dul bar byed pa'i man ngag
item.skttrans: kar ma tsa tu ra ba dan u pa ta sha na ma pra tsa sa na

item.coloph: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad d+hA ka ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las rdo rje pag mo mngon par 'byung ga ces bya ba dzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na a la ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o
rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dza ya se na'i zhabs dang / lots+tsha ba btsun pa d+harma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tur+yo gi nI saM pu ta tan+t+ra nA ma

item.tib: gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: gu h+ya badzra tan+t+ra rA dzA
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gsang ba'i rtag pa rdzogs so

item.tib: gsang ba gcod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: gu h+ya tshe da tan+tra rA dza
item.coloph: gsang ba gcod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa
item.skttrans: shrI tsakra saM ba ra gu h+ya a tsi tA ya
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta gA ya d+hA ra dang/ shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kha sa ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA ya
item.coloph: dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ces bya ba rdzogs so// //gA ya d+hA ra dang shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA bga ga na tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// gA ya d+hA rA dang/ shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI kA ya wA ka tsit+ta tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ /rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang/ lots+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: rat+na mA le tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba dang rab bzhin gsang ba rdzogs so// //dge slong shAkya ye shes dang/ rin chen rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dam tshig chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: dam tshig chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rin chen rdo rje dang shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal stobs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra nA ma

item.tib: dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dpal ye sehs gsang ba de kho na nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing zhus

item.tib: dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na mA le tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor ba tsan+d+ra mA le dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhin gzhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+wa ka dz+nyA na tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //sin+ga gling gi rnal 'byor tsan+d+ra mA le dang/ /dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhes te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ga'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI tsan+d+ra mA le tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ga'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI rat+na dz+wa la tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ma dang/ blang shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing zhus ste gtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI sUr+ya tsakra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //blar ga yA d+ha ra dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba

item.tib: dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza

item.coloph: dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //zhus dag

item.tib: dpal 'khor ko sdom pa ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI tsak+k+ra saM ba ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badzra gyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a b+ha ka ra dang/ sangs rgyas grags pas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam 'joms rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: badzra bai ra bi d+ha ra tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam 'joms rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: badzra sid+d+ha tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal dpa' bo dang dpa' mo mngon par grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI wI ra DA ki nI yo gi ya b+hi Shiny+tsa sid+d+hi tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo mngon par grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: dpal rdo rje chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI badzra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rje chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ya sA ba gA ya d+hA ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// //slad nas yang bod kyi lots+tsha ba gzhan rnams/ gzhan gyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang gi ming bcug cing gzhan gyi ming 'phyi bded dag dang/ mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir/ slad nas rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ces bya ba
item.skttrans: e ka wi ra sid+d+ha rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po di paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas gtan la phab pa'o

ri Shi a ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes bsgyur zhing te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA mu dra ti la kaM nA ma yo gi ni tan+t+ra rA dza su bi b+hu
item.coloph: dpal phyag rgy chen po'i thig rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang bas bsgyur zhing slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang/ kha che'i dpe gnyis la gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rab mchog rmad du byung ba chen po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na ti la ka yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dzA pa ra ma ma hA a da b+hud taM
item.coloph: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA g+hu pa ta dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //gsung rab rtogs nas slob dpon gyis lhag par dkrol te bstan pa la/ /ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /sems can sems bde thob par smon

rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po a t+wa badzra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha wa chims yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: badzra DA ki nI ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma

item.coloph: 'byung po 'dul ba ces bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag cu drug pa las ci snyed pa rnams rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po b+hu ta A ka ra ba ra dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang skur ba'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badzra pAN+ya b+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang skur ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+he dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so

rdzogs so// //shri he ru ka a b+hi d+ha nA nA mA// dpal he ru kar brjod pa ces bya ba// rji ti spar kar dang/ lo tsa ba tshul khrims shes rab rgyal bas bgyur ba'o// yang slad kyis pan Ti ta chen po sbas pa'i nyi ma dang/ bod kyi ki ts va bgos ltas btsas// slob dpon chen po la ba pa'i 'grel pa dang gtugs bcos pa'o zhus dag// //grags pa'i yad 'od rgyal mthong ldan pa'i// rin cen dang mtshungs rin chen bzanh po yis// mkhas pa pad ma ka' ra yis zhal sngar na// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe' las bsgyur// dpal a ti sha'i shal snga nas// lo tsha ba dge slong bol gros lha la gdams pa'o

item.tib: nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a b+hi d+ha na ud ta ra tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na ka ra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nus sgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// slad kyis rga gar gyi mkhan po pra pa ka ra dang/ dge slong shg kya ye shes kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa
item.skttrans: yo gi ni san tsa r+ya
item.coloph: rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa// rdzogs s+ho

phag mo mngon par 'bung ba zhes bya ba// rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mnya' na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ // zhus chen gyi lo tsa ba khu stond dngos grub gis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: 'gu y+ya badzra tan tra ra dza

item.tib: gsang ba spyod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: 'gu ya tshe ta tan tra rA dzA
item.coloph: gsan ba spyod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: dpal 'khor lo'i sdom pa gsang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa
item.skttrans: shrI tsag kra saM ba ra gi h+ya a tsi ta ya
item.coloph: rdzogs+ho// pan ti ta ga ya da ra dang/ shag kya ye shes gyis sgyur pa'o// zhus pas dag

item.tib: dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud gi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kha sa ma ha tan tra ra tsa na ma
item.coloph: dpal na 'kha' dang// mnyam pa'i rgyud gi rgyal po zhes bya ba// rdzogs s+ho// //ga ya da ra dang/ shagya ye shes gis sgyur ba'o

item.tib: dpal naM mkha' 'gro chen po'i rgyud gi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shri ma ha kha sa ha na tra ra dza
item.coloph: dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud gyi rgyal po// rdzogs+ho// ga ya da ra dang/ shakya ye shes kyi sgyur pa'o

item.tib: dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud gi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shri ka ya bag tsi ra tan tra ra dza
item.coloph: dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud gi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho// //pan tri ta g+ha ya d+ha ra dang lo tsa ba shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rin cen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: rad na ma ke tan 'dra ra tsa
item.coloph: rgyud gi rgyal po gsang ba dang rang bzhin gsang ba// //rdzogs+ho// dge slong shag kya ye shes dang/ rin cen rdo rjes sgyur ba

item.tib: dam tshig chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ma ha sa ma ya tan tra na ma
item.coloph: dam tshig chen po'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// rin cen rdo rje dang shag kya ye shes gyis sgyur pa'o

item.tib: dpal stobs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shri ma ha pa la tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ran na badzra dang** dge slong sha kya ye shes kyis zhus cing stan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal pa
item.skttrans: shri ny+yaba 'gu y+ya tan tra ra dza
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dpal ye shes gsang ba'i de kho na nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho// //rnal 'byord ma tsan dra ma le dang/ dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus

item.tib: dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shri ny+ya na ma le tan tra ra dza
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rnal 'byord ma rtsan dra ma le dang dge slong shag kyia ye shes kyis// bsgyur cing zhus te rtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+wa la ny+yA na tan tra ra dza
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //sing ga gling gi rnal 'byord tsan tra ma le dang/ dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bstan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shri tsan dra ma le tad tra ra dza
item.coloph: dpal zla ba 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: dpal rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shri rad na dz+wa la tan tra na ma
item.coloph: rin cen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho// //rnal 'byord ma zla ba'i 'phreng ba dang/ bla ma shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

item.tib: dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI su rgya tsag kra tan tra ra dza na ma
item.coloph: dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rhgyud kyi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho// //bla ma g+ha yA 'ang rad dge slong shag kya se shes kyis gyur

item.tib: dpal ye shes rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shri gany na ra dza tan tra ra dza
item.coloph: dpal ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// //rdzogs s+ho// //rgy agar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya 'ad+ha ra dang// dge slong shag kya kyis// sgyur cing zhus ste rtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI d+ha ki ni sam b+ha ra tan tra ra dza na ma
